title: PLAZA / RENE CASE MONEY RAT
description: Asking about the case and discussing women.

dialogueTree.title: René Arnoux: ""Unfortunately, I don't." He shrugs..."
dialogueTree.text: "Unfortunately, I don't." He shrugs. "Unlike most of the locals, I have no qualms about assisting law enforcement, but this affair has passed me by completely."

links.title: You: ""And... most of the locals?""
links.text: "And... most of the locals?"

links.title: René Arnoux: ""In Martinaise, the Union is the la..."
links.text: "In Martinaise, the Union is the law, so can you really blame them?"

links.title: You: ""But you don't have a problem with..."
links.text: "But you don't have a problem with cops?"

links.title: René Arnoux: ""*Cop* is a pejorative term. I don'..."
links.text: "*Cop* is a pejorative term. I don't have a problem with policemen. On the contrary, I admire the effort to bring order to our streets."

links.title: Rhetoric: "He doesn't know about the crime. Yo..."
links.text: He doesn't know about the crime. Your time is better spent discussing *politics*.

links.title: You: ""What about policewomen?""
links.text: "What about policewomen?"

links.title: René Arnoux: ""I'm confident they are indispensab..."
links.text: "I'm confident they are indispensable in regard to all the paperwork and other administrative duties."

links.title: You: ""Not to mention keeping the station..."
links.text: "Not to mention keeping the station tidy and the men fed and happy."

links.title: René Arnoux: ""No man can afford to turn his eyes..."
links.text: "No man can afford to turn his eyes to the horizon if his rear isn't secured. If the womenfolk take care of that, then men can tackle the bigger issues."

links.title: You: ""Great minds think alike, René. You..."
links.text: "Great minds think alike, René. You and I really seem to have it all figured out."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The RCM doesn't discriminate," the..."
links.text: "The RCM doesn't discriminate," the lieutenant marks dryly. "Women are held to the same standards as men. And -- as reflected in the quarterly statistics -- are equally effective in their jobs."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Unlike men, they also have to deal..."
links.text: "Unlike men, they also have to deal with the very same mentality you two are displaying right now." He frowns. "If it weren't for *this* they would outperform us."

links.title: René Arnoux: ""Well, I'm glad at least some peopl..."
links.text: "Well, I'm glad at least some people bearing your insignia have kept a level head in these turbulent times."

links.title: You: ""I guess, it might not be as black..."
links.text: "I guess, it might not be as black and white, but disagreeing makes me uncomfortable."

links.title: You: ""You know, I'm getting second thoug..."
links.text: "You know, I'm getting second thoughts about this."

links.title: René Arnoux: ""It's as good a time as any to turn..."
links.text: "It's as good a time as any to turn our attention to a different topic, officer," he says, adjusting his cap.

links.title: You: ""There are no duties RCM women coul..."
links.text: "There are no duties RCM women couldn't carry out."

links.title: René Arnoux: ""But you must agree that Nature, in..."
links.text: "But you must agree that Nature, in her infinite wisdom, has made men more fit to perform certain... more *challenging* tasks, don't you, officer?"

links.title: You: ""No, I don't think there's *any* ev..."
links.text: "No, I don't think there's *any* evolutionary inequality at play here."

links.title: René Arnoux: ""Really, officer?" He smirks. "Matc..."
links.text: "Really, officer?" He smirks. "Match an average woman against an average man in a dark alley and see who comes out on top."

links.title: René Arnoux: ""Gender equality is a very noble, v..."
links.text: "Gender equality is a very noble, very *modern* idea, but in real life, primal roles prevail. But I do not wish to discuss this matter further."

links.title: You: ""Yes, I guess that's true.""
links.text: "Yes, I guess that's true."

links.title: René Arnoux: ""No reason to even feel bad about t..."
links.text: "No reason to even feel bad about that, it's just the way of the animal kingdom."

links.title: You: ""You better not be implying that wo..."
links.text: "You better not be implying that women are unfit for fieldwork..."

links.title: René Arnoux: ""I am merely stating that Nature, i..."
links.text: "I am merely stating that Nature, in her infinite wisdom, has made men more fit to perform certain... more challenging tasks than women."

links.title: René Arnoux: ""Remaining headstrong, making tough..."
links.text: "Remaining headstrong, making tough decisions on the spot, or even tackling physical obstacles are a few examples of such *challenges*."

links.title: You: ""You're a bit of an asshole, aren't..."
links.text: "You're a bit of an asshole, aren't you, old man?"

links.title: René Arnoux: ""There's no point in getting angry..."
links.text: "There's no point in getting angry at nature, officer. This is just the way we are *made*."

links.title: Logic: "That woman, who couldn't choose bet..."
links.text: That woman, who couldn't choose between him and Gaston -- Jeanne-Marie -- *she* must be the reason René is so bitter. He holds her indecisiveness against all women.

links.title: You: ""Tell me something you are really g..."
links.text: "Tell me something you are really good at and I'll find a woman who's better."

links.title: René Arnoux: ""I don't want to get into this argu..."
links.text: "I don't want to get into this argument with a police officer," he replies calmly. "Let's just say that in the last eighty-two years I have repeatedly seen my beliefs confirmed in full."

links.title: You: ""I try to avoid voicing opinions on..."
links.text: "I try to avoid voicing opinions on controversial matters. Let's just drop it."

links.title: René Arnoux: ""I know the kind," he says with a f..."
links.text: "I know the kind," he says with a frown. "Gaston here is the same. A weathervane. Never stood up for anything in his life either."

links.title: Gaston Martin: ""Oh, René..." He smiles wide and fr..."
links.text: "Oh, René..." He smiles wide and friendly. "If you only knew life beyond confrontations, conflict and extremities..."

links.title: You: ""So, again: you don't know anything?""
links.text: "So, again: you don't know anything?"

links.title: René Arnoux: ""If I knew, I would not be *afraid*..."
links.text: "If I knew, I would not be *afraid* to tell you. I simply don't. I am an old man, not a coward. The daily business of the riff-raff no longer concerns me."

links.title: Drama: "'Tis true sire. He knows nothing."
links.text: 'Tis true sire. He knows nothing.

links.title: Inland Empire: "This is a man with a lot of past, b..."
links.text: This is a man with a lot of past, but little present. And almost no future.
